QuestForKyogre.title: The Legendary Kyogre
QuestForKyogre.text: Ahoy there, @.^^There's something rather...serious I need to talk about with you. Something that I wouldn't be able to explain in just a letter, ya see. You're the most trustworthy person in town, so I'm coming to you with this problem o' mine. Please stop by my shop as soon as you can.^^-Willy
